price: কোৱা, ‘মোক আদেশ কৰা হৈছে, মই যেন আল্লাহৰ আনুগত্যত একনিষ্ঠ হৈ কেৱল তেওঁৰেই ইবাদত কৰোঁ,
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innī umir'tu an aʿbuda al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
